notice.en:
1. Course level: upper intermediate
2. Students who have studied in EMI, can take the EAP/ESP courses. (Second year, third year, fourth year students only)
3. Students need to attend the first class .
4. Students who have passed the EAP/ESP course
notice.ch:
學術英文(EAP)中高級課程。
1.歡迎大二以上有修習EMI的學生選修課程
2.可抵LN29課號，修課完成後請至語言中心辦理學分抵修。
3.第一次上課未出席，需事先跟老師請假，否則扣學期總成績
4.前兩週未出席者，老師有權退選該生

1. Course level: upper intermediate
2. Students who have studied in EMI, can take the EAP/ESP courses. (Second year, third year, fourth year students only)

goal.ch:
修習完本課程，學生能夠
1. 辨識各種口說/簡報技巧，並能分析自己的優劣勢
2. 選取參考資料、應用專業術語、並組織成恰當的簡報內容
3. 應用各種口說/簡報技巧實際演練
4. 提高口說/簡報之流暢度、正確度、及專業度
goal.en:
Upon finishing the course, students are able to
1. distinguish different kinds of spoken/presentation skills and analyze strengths and weaknesses in speaking
2. select references, apply professional terms, and organize info properly for PPT presentations
3. apply different kinds of spoken/presentation skills
4. improve fluency, accuracy, and professionalism in speaking

gradMethod.ch:
出席及課堂參與 (Academic Word List Speaking Exercise) 20％
迷你專業口說錄音錄影 20％
彈性調整/差異5-10％
演講 20％
投資/募資簡報 20％
科技/科學簡報 20％
gradMethod.en:
In-Class Participation (Academic Word List Speaking Exercise) 20％
Mini Pro Talks/Recording 20％
Powerful Speech20％
Pitch Deck Presentation20％
Tech/Science Presentation 20％
